review:
**** ************ ***** *** ** *** ** ********** She saved our son. Gave the most applicable medicines and the diagnosis was spot on. My son was suffering from an uncontrollable high grade fever and some other issues due to some viral infection.  Her examination process was very detailed and was able to infer the reasons to higher degree of accuracy.  Best part is she is very patient and listens to the parent's part of the story instead of other doctors that impose their line of treatment regardless of the patients condition.

Much recommended for any ailing baby.

She’s a very patient friendly doctor who always listens to kid’s parents and very polite and calm in her conduct. She’s friendly with kids she treats. I am consulting her for my son ever since we moved to Bangalore from Kolkata. Would recommend her to other parents.

She is very wonderful Doctor she ask all the deatils very nicely and guide each and everything and consult very nicely Aster Hospital staffs are very helpful and very responsive it was a great experience
Doctor has explained the situation after carefully diagnosing my son. He is treated well and given medication for possible wheezing cough which was  seen for almost 4 months now
Dr.Jyoti is an amazing person and understands the case in consideration very well. Excellent diagnosis and treatment.
Tok enough time to go through previous visits and made changes accordingly. Patiently explained the medicine dosage and reason why she was prescribing it.
She *** ******* ********* *** does very reasonable diagnosis.explains the problem and hear all concerns patiently

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She spent a lot of time trying to understand my daughters overall health and current issue. Very patient doctor.
She is very good . Discuss the problem in detail and gives appopriate treatment. Highly recommend her.
